mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.content_type_id, ct.type_name, c.title, c.content, c.is_published, c.view_count, c.created_by, a.name as creator_name, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM content c LEFT JOIN content_type ct ON c.content_type_id = ct.content_type_id LEFT JOIN admin a ON c.created_by = a.admin_id WHERE c.content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content (content_type_id, title, content, is_published, created_by, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{contentTypeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isPublished}, #{createdBy}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE content SET content_type_id = #{contentTypeId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_published = #{isPublished}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
UPDATE content SET is_published = #{isPublished}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
